pageContext.claim: “You came by the tens of millions to become part of a historic movement, the likes of which the world has never seen before.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump is a minority president, in terms of the popular vote. He lost the popular vote by nearly 2.9 million votes to Hillary Clinton. Trump’s electoral college win, meanwhile, was a squeaker. Trump had narrow victories in three key states (and narrow losses in two others).
